original_title: Te amo tanto que escribí una película para nunca enojarme con vos
overview: Alba is away on a trip while, in her hometown, a friend of hers dies. Her travel companions cannot seem to grasp what happened and, without being able to go back home, Alba is forced to go through mourning alone, even though she’s surrounded by people.
title: I Love You So Much That I Wrote a Movie to Never Get Upset with You
